title: Bulgaria Gazette – News from Bulgaria » Eight TV stations broadcast the match between Levski and Debreceni
body_text:
Eight TV stations broadcast the match between Levski and Debreceni
Eight TV stations will broadcast live the Champions league qualification match between Levski and Debreceni.
The Bulgarian Pro BG is one of them. The rest are: Al Jazeera Sport +1, NTV+ Nash Football, RSI La 2, SF 2, Sky Sport 1 (Germany), Sky Sport Info (Portal), Sky Sports Interactive, TSR 2.
Le
The team of Debreceni arrives tomorrow at 12:30 at the Sofia airport. The Hungarian team will pass through terminal 2 of the Sofia airport, announced the official website of Levski. The champions of Hungary will then check in “Grand Hotel Sofia”.
At 18:45 h. the coach of Debreceni AndrГЎs Herczeg will brief his team in the press conference hall of the hotel. At 20:00 h. begins the official practice of the team on the stadium “Georgi Asparuhov”.
